gurmukhi: kYsy qoih qwir hY, suin jV; Awp fuibXo Bv swgr ]
transliteration: Kaise Tohe Daar(i) Hai Soun(i) Jad Aap Doubyo Bhav Saagad||
translation: O fool ! listen, how can he cause you to cause the dreadful ocean of Sansara (world), when he himself is drowned in great ocean?

gurmukhi: Cuitho kwl Pws qy qb hI; gho srin jgqwgr ]3]5]
transliteration: Chhoutiho Kaal Phaas Te Tab Higado Sharan(i) Jagtaagad||3||1||
translation: You can escape the trap of death only when you catch hold of the prop of the world and take refuge in Him.3.

gurmukhi: imqR ipAwry nUM; hwlu murIdW dw khxw ]
transliteration: Mitra Pidare Noondhaal Mureedaan Daa Saihnaa||
translation: Convey to the dear friend the condition of the disciples,

gurmukhi: quDu ibnu, rogu rjweIAw dw EFx; nwg invwsw dy rhxw ]
transliteration: Tudh(u) Bin(u) Rog(u) Rajaaeeaan Daa Odhan Naag Nivaasaan De Raihnaa||
translation: Without Thee, the taking over of quilt is like disease and living in the house is like living with serpents;

gurmukhi: sUl surwhI KMjru ipAwlw; ibMg ksweIAw dw shxw ]
transliteration: Sool Suraahikhanjar(u) Piaalaa Bing Kasaaeeaan Daa Saihnaa||
translation: The flask is like the spike, the cup is like a dagger and (the separation) is like enduring the chopper of the butchers,

gurmukhi: XwrVy dw swnUM sQru; cMgw B`T KyiVAw dw rhxw ]1]6]
transliteration: Yaarade Daa Saanoon Satthar(u) Channdaa Bhatth Khediaan Daa Raihnaa||1||1||
translation: The pallet of the beloved Friend is most pleasing and the worldly pleasures are like furnace.1.1
TILNG KAFI OF THE TENTH KING
The supreme Destroyer is alone the Creator,

gurmukhi: Awid AMq AnMiq mUriq; gVHn BMjnhwr ]1]rhwau ]
transliteration: Aadh Ant Anant(i) Moondat Gadhan Bhanjanhaar||1||rahaao||
translation: He is in the beginning and in the end, He is the infinite entity, the Creator and the Destroyer…Pause.

gurmukhi: inMd ausqq jaun ky sm; s`qRü imqR n koie ]
transliteration: Nind Oustat Jaoun Ke Sam Shattru Mittra Na Koe||
translation: The calumny and Praise are equal to him and he has no friend, no foe,

gurmukhi: kaun bwt prI iqsY; pQ swrQI rQ hoie ]1]
transliteration: Kaoun Baat Paritisaipath Saarthi Rath Hoe||1||
translation: Of what crucial necessity, He became the charioteer ?1.

gurmukhi: qwq mwq n jwq jwkr; puqR pOqR, mukMd ]
transliteration: Taat Maat Na Jaat Jaakar Poutra Paoutra Moukand||
translation: He, the Giver of salvation, has no father, no mother, no son and no grandson;

gurmukhi: kaun kwj khwihgy; qy Awin dyvik nMd ]2]
transliteration: Kaoun Kaaj Kahaahenge Te Aan(i) Devak(i) Nand||2||
translation: O what necessity he caused others to call Him the son of Devaki ?2.
